title: How to Clean Oven Smells With Orange Peel

steps.headline: Peel an orange.
steps.description: Try to create a few large peels rather than many small ones as this is easier to control but if it is too hard, small is fine.

steps.headline: Place the peels on a baking tray / sheet.
Put into the oven and bake.
steps.description: Bake for about 10 minutes or until you notice the smell has been removed.

text: Peel an orange. Try to create a few large peels rather than many small ones as this is easier to control but if it is too hard, small is fine. Place the peels on a baking tray / sheet.  Put into the oven and bake. Bake for about 10 minutes or until you notice the smell has been removed.
